CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE .
CARDINAL . The applicant 's wife died on CARDINAL DATE . On DATE ORG ( Sąd Rejonowy ) declared that the applicant , his stepdaughter - PERSON - and her CARDINAL grandsons were to inherit the estate .

CARDINAL . On DATE M.F. , one of the grandsons , filed an application for distribution of the estate of the applicant 's wife with ORG . He also applied to the court for dissolution of the joint matrimonial property of the applicant and his late wife .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court held the first hearing .
CARDINAL . NORP In a letter of CARDINAL DATE the applicant requested the President of ORG of ORG to expedite the proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE the trial court held hearings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG gave a final decision . The applicant appealed . On DATE ORG ( Sąd Wojewódzki ) set aside the first - instance decision and remitted the case .
CARDINAL . On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the court held hearings . At a hearing held on DATE the court ordered that expert evidence be obtained .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant complained to the President of ORG about the slow conduct of the proceedings . On DATE the President of ORG informed the applicant that his complaint about the delays in the proceedings was justified .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court held a hearing .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG gave a decision . On DATE the applicant lodged an appeal with ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE ORG held hearings . On DATE ORG set aside the impugned decision and remitted the case .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court held a hearing . On DATE the applicant again requested the President of ORG to expedite the proceedings .
CARDINAL . At the hearing held on DATE the parties settled their claims in respect of a number of movables . Subsequently , the court discontinued the proceedings in that respect .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant complained about the length of the proceedings to the Minister of ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court held a hearing and ordered that expert evidence be obtained .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG gave a partial decision ( postanowienie częściowe ) . On DATE ORG held a hearing .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Minister of Justice informed the applicant that the President of ORG would supervise the proceedings . ORG held further hearings on DATE , CARDINAL and CARDINAL DATE . On DATE an expert submitted his report to the court .

CARDINAL . At the hearing held on DATE ORG gave a decision . On DATE the applicant lodged an appeal with ORG . On DATE the applicant complained to the Minister of ORG about a delay in the proceedings and the fact that his appeal of DATE had not been transmitted to ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG held a hearing . The hearings listed for CARDINAL and DATE were adjourned .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the firstinstance decision . On DATE the applicant lodged a cassation appeal with ORG ( Sąd Najwyższy ) . The proceedings were terminated by a decision of ORG of DATE .
